pkgmetadata.longdescription: Powerful Goodness-of-Fit Tests Based on the Likelihood Ratio // Provides new types of omnibus tests which are generally much more powerful than traditional tests (including the Kolmogorov- Smirnov, Cramer-von Mises and Anderson-Darling tests),see Zhang (2002) doi:10.1111/1467-9868.00337.
